                           Release Notes
-----------------------------------------------------------------

Comments :
The tough biker Harley and his no less tough Cowboy friend Marlboro learn 
that an old friend of theirs will lose his bar, because a bank wants to 
build a new complex and demands 2.5 million dollars for a new contract in 
advance. Harley and Marlboro decide to help him by robbing the corrupt bank. 
Unfortunately they target the wrong safety transport and get hold of an amount 
of a new synthetic drug. Now they are targeted both by criminal bankers and 
killers of the drug mob.

Director : Simon Wincer

 
Writer: Don Michael Paul
